languages.text: {n}Священнослужитель скорбно качает головой.{/n} "Похоже, сестра Арджента ошибалась в тебе и лишь сейчас осознала истину. Но не важно. Хотел{mf||а} ли ты поговорить о чем-то еще?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Священнослужитель скорбно качает головой.{/n} "Похоже, сестра Арджента ошибалась в тебе и лишь сейчас осознала истину. Но не важно. Хотел{mf||а} ли ты поговорить о чем-то еще?"

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"
languages.original_text: {n}Священнослужитель скорбно качает головой.{/n} "Похоже, сестра Арджента ошибалась в тебе и лишь сейчас осознала истину. Но не важно. Хотел{mf||а} ли ты поговорить о чем-то еще?"

{n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“看来阿洁塔修女错看了你，直到现在她才意识到真相。不过，不要在意这一点，你还有什么要讨论的吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“看来阿洁塔修女错看了你，直到现在她才意识到真相。不过，不要在意这一点，你还有什么要讨论的吗？”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus niega con la cabeza, apenado.{/n} «Parece que la hermana Argenta acaba de descubrir que se equivocaba con usted. En fin, olvídelo. ¿Hay algo más de lo que quiera hablar?».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus niega con la cabeza, apenado.{/n} «Parece que la hermana Argenta acaba de descubrir que se equivocaba con usted. En fin, olvídelo. ¿Hay algo más de lo que quiera hablar?».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは悲しげに首を振った。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタはあなたについて誤解していて、やっと真実に気づいたようですね。それはさておき…他に話したいことはありますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは悲しげに首を振った。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタはあなたについて誤解していて、やっと真実に気づいたようですね。それはさておき…他に話したいことはありますか？」

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus schüttelt betrübt den Kopf.{/n} "Anscheinend hat Schwester Argenta sich in Euch geirrt und erst jetzt die Wahrheit erkannt. Aber wie dem auch sei ... Möchtet Ihr sonst noch irgendetwas besprechen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus schüttelt betrübt den Kopf.{/n} "Anscheinend hat Schwester Argenta sich in Euch geirrt und erst jetzt die Wahrheit erkannt. Aber wie dem auch sei ... Möchtet Ihr sonst noch irgendetwas besprechen?"

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus secoue tristement la tête.{/n} « Il semblerait que sœur Argenta se soit trompée à votre sujet. Ses yeux viennent seulement de s'ouvrir. Mais oublions ça. Aviez-vous autre chose à me demander ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus secoue tristement la tête.{/n} « Il semblerait que sœur Argenta se soit trompée à votre sujet. Ses yeux viennent seulement de s'ouvrir. Mais oublions ça. Aviez-vous autre chose à me demander ? »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, üzgün bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Anlaşılan Rahibe Argenta, hakkında yanılmış. Gerçeği anca şimdi görebildi. Neyse, boş verelim bunları. Konuşmak istediğin başka bir şey var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus shakes his head mournfully.{/n} "It appears that Sister Argenta was mistaken about you, and only now has she realised the truth. But never mind that. Was there anything else you wished to discuss?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus başını üzgün bir tavırla sallıyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre Rahibe Argenta senin hakkında yanılmış ve gerçeği ancak yeni görmüş ama bu konuyu bir kenara koyalım. Konuşmak istediğin başka bir şey var mıydı?"
